patch:
diff --git a/src/H5VLcallback.c b/src/H5VLcallback.c
index 1662776ef9..9616674648 100644
--- a/src/H5VLcallback.c
+++ b/src/H5VLcallback.c
@@ -5191,6 +5191,11 @@ H5VL_link_get(const H5VL_object_t *vol_obj, const H5VL_loc_params_t *loc_params,
     herr_t ret_value       = SUCCEED; /* Return value */
 
     FUNC_ENTER_NOAPI(FAIL)
+// FIXME: Crash CWE-824: Access of Uninitialized Pointer
+    
+    /* Check for NULL vol_obj */
+    if(vol_obj == NULL || vol_obj->connector == NULL || vol_obj->data == NULL)
+        HGOTO_ERROR(H5E_ARGS, H5E_BADVALUE, FAIL, "invalid VOL object");
 
     /* Set wrapper info in API context */
     if (H5VL_set_vol_wrapper(vol_obj) < 0)
